item.description:
At $245 CDN, this is the most affordable opportunity to experience a race car that I have seen!

You get to experience the Reynard Formula 2000 purpose built single seater open wheeled race car with an incredible power to weight ratio of 125 HP for only 1000 lbs. Also, you get to learn some real racing techniques from professional racing instructors.

What you get:


  • 90-minute Welcome / Racing Techniques Class
  • Race Car Introduction Trackside
  • Fitment to your Race Car
  • 10-minute "Warm-up" Lapping Session
  • 15-minute Lead-Follow Lapping Session


Check it all out at www.race2000.com/courses/tlfr1

Some of us have signed up for the Saturday June 27th Noon course. There are other time slots available as well on the same day.

We will be leaving on Friday, June 26th for Toronto, and probably return on Sunday.

Registration for the course as well as arrangements for travel, boarding and lodging will be your responsibility.

More details about the travel schedule will be updated here closer to the date as well as based on the level of interest.
item.name: Drive a REAL Race Car on a REAL Race Track
